ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: CSIR-CFTRI for the support and infrastructure facility. We thank Dr. Laskowski (The European Bioinformatics Institute (EMBL-EBI, Cambridgeshire, UK) for his valuable suggestions and providing customized LigPlot program. We thank Professor David A. Case (Rutgers University, NJ, USA) for providing access to the latest AMBER20 software.
